channel.title: Blog on Alex Zhu
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Alex Zhu

item.title: AI vs. Creative Writing
item.description: While I was writing a Facebook post introducing my friend David as director of a debate tournament, I started thinking about the creative writing process and whether AI would be able to do it or not.

item.title: B2 Stock Trader
item.description: Alternative Data Trading using Python, Google Trends, NYT Articles, and Cohere (Co-authored by co-creator Ryan Shen)

item.title: Three Golden Tips for the Waterloo AIF
item.description: If you implement these three tips, you will increase your chances of being accepted.

item.title: What I Learned From My First Term at UWaterloo
item.description: This is what I learned about studying and lifestyle during my first study term in Software Engineering at Waterloo!

item.title: Tutorial: How I Made This Website and You Can Too
item.description: I wanted a simple blog website that was easy to set up and use, and also one where I had ownership and customization: the answer was a Hugo static site hosted on GitHub Pages.

item.title: Lightning Speed Tutorial: Git and GitHub
item.description: No one really teaches Git and GitHub, but it’s a must-know if you’re ever going to develop software in a group (like at a company).

item.title: SE 101 Final Project: Full Stack Arduino Exercise Tracker (4Gains)
item.description: Our final project for SE101 was supposed to be a exercise tracker device that would revolutionize the fitness experience.

item.title: Why We Should Be Together
item.description: Please read: this is not about relationships.

item.title: Radomir Chess: Grade 12 Summative
item.description: This is the Readme file from our Grade 12 summative project.
